Grey Talon: - Base bullet damage reduced from 30 to 27
- Movement speed scaling from Spirit Power reduced from 0.032 to 0.025
Mirage: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Scarabs|Size=20} Fire Scarabs cooldown increased from 32s to 40s
- HP per boon reduced from 41 to 37
Bebop: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb now gains 1% stack on attach (still gains 5% on target death)
Paradox: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20} Time Wall T3 silence duration reduced from 3s to 2.5s

Siphon Bullets: - Max HP Steal is now affected by falloff
Improved Burst: - Damage threshold requirement reduced from 200 to 175

Fire Scarabs: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Scarabs|Size=20} Fire Scarabs cooldown increased from 32s to 40s
Sticky Bomb: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb now gains 1% stack on attach (still gains 5% on target death)
Time Wall: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20} Time Wall T3 silence duration reduced from 3s to 2.5s
